channel.title: PyQtGraph on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in PyQtGraph on Memo Tut

item.title: [Python] The simplest way to try PyQtGraph
item.description: Before throwing it out, I definitely checked it. PyQtGraph may not be available in the interpreter. One line from command line (or terminal) Typing python -m pyqtgraph.examples will bring up the example launcher in one line from the command line. (It was written in Documentation of README.md of PyQtGraph.) python -m hoge.hogehoge is a command that executes the module hoge.hogehoge.py. (Python 2.7.x documentation) Since it is a module name, do not write the extension .
